title: The Elder Scrolls IV Oblivion updated + all dlc's repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
The Elder Scrolls IV Oblivion + all dlc's

Repack features:

Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.2.0416
Precracked - install and play
Install Time - 10minutes [Quad Core]
Final size: 5.50gb
Operating system: Win Xp,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)

DLCs included:

 - Horse Armor Pack
 - Spell Tomes
 - Knights of the Nine
 - The Orrery 
 - The Wizard's Tower 
 - The Thieves Den 
 - Mehrunes' Razor 
 - The Vile Lair 
 - Shivering Isles
 - The Fighter's Stronghold


INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual....

NOTE: After installation, open the installed game directory, then open 'OblivionLauncher.exe' ,it will configure the optimal settings for your pc...
Then click on 'Data Files' options and make sure that all the dlc's are checked in the checkbox, 'Oblivion.esm(Master file)' may not be checked, so check it too....
**Now run the game, Use launcher only to change Video settings and enable/disable DLC, To play game use 'Oblivion.exe' in install directory or desktop shortcut..... 
Open it using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any crash.........

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
